document.full_text: when the first ambulance pulled up to tuscaloosa's main hospital after wednesday's tornadoes, trauma coordinator andrew lee opened its doors to a sickening sight: three dead children.
document.title: tornadoes inflict grim toll on alabama children
lines_and_colors: when the first ambulance pulled up to tuscaloosa's main hospital after wednesday's tornadoes, trauma coordinator andrew lee opened its doors to a sickening sight: three dead children.
